SIAMCAT
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • SIAMCAT: Statistical Inference of Associations between Microbial Communities And host phenoTypes

Retrieve a sample_data-class object from object.

Retrieve a sample_data-class object from object.

meta(siamcat, errorIfNULL=TRUE)

# S4 method for ANY
meta(siamcat)

# S4 method for sample_data
meta(siamcat)

Arguments

siamcat

(Required). An instance of siamcat-class that contains a label or instance of sample_data-class.

Value

The sample_data-class object or NULL.

Examples

    data(siamcat_example)
    meta(siamcat_example)
